speaker: Male Voice
line: Weren't their coordinates sent out from the space station...?

speaker: Female Voice
line: Who cares? They're here and alive. Do they look like a mannequin to you?

speaker: Male Voice
line: ...Weak heartbeat and pulse... March, you better do CPR.

speaker: Female Voice
line: Huh!? Hehe... I—I've never done it before! Dan Heng, you do it!

children.speaker: Female Voice
children.line: Wait — stop it!

children.speaker: Female Voice
children.line: They're awake!

line: Are you all right? Can you hear me? Do you remember your name?
Aw, this isn't good... Can you try harder? I'm sure you can at least remember your name...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ▶ (Trailblazer)? Nice to meet you. My name's Dan Heng, and this is March 7th.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: This space station was just attacked by the Antimatter Legion . We came to help with the rescue at the request of Lead Researcher Asta .

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Goons owned by the Destruction . You're lucky that the most dangerous Lord Ravager among them isn't around, just some nasty minions.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: We'll take those invaders out soon, don't worry.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Uh-huh, a petite cutie with pink hair. Madam Herta appointed her to be the acting lead researcher.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ...That girl really needs to step up. I can't believe her own employee doesn't even know her name...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Back to the master control zone . Asta and the other researchers have gathered there.

speaker: March 7th
line: Plus that's where we parked the Astral Express ! Don't you worry, we'll protect you from the monsters and clear up this mess.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Dan Heng and I are members of the Astral Express crew~

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: Well the Express has some dealings with Madam Herta, so we come to visit the space station from time to time.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: We just so happened to arrive during this... invasion. Of course, as a — ahem — crew of heroes, we're happy to lend a hand.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Yeah, you've never seen it? The Express comes here every once in a while.

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: It's a unique train that can travel between the stars with the power of the Trailblaze Aeon .

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: I'll show you once we're back to the master control zone~

speaker: Dan Heng
line: You and March go back together.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Arlan from the Security Department lost contact in the vicinity. I need to find him first.

speaker: March 7th
line: Oh, all right. You stay safe.

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ (Trailblazer), maybe you should take this.

speaker: March 7th
line: The Legion are rampaging through the space station like a pack of wolves — this trip won't be a walk in the park. It's better if you have something to protect yourself.

speaker: March 7th
line: Just a suggestion though — you're safe as long as you stick with me~!

text: Leave and see what's going on outside

title: Mission Description
content: You move your gaze away from the unfamiliar ceiling and look at the variety of Curios around you. A woman's voice echoes in your head but you're in no position to confirm whether you can clearly remember it."When you have a chance to make a choice, make one that you know you won't regret..." You decide to first listen to March 7th and Dan Heng, who had just left. At least they don't look like bad people.Alright, now that there are companions, it's time to leave this place.

text: View details of all unlocked characters

html_content:
(Interactive tutorial)
Open the Character menu to view character information.
Detailed information about characters can be viewed in the Character screen
Each character has their own Type. (Trailblazer) is a Physical Type character.
Each character has their own Path. (Trailblazer) is a character that follows the Path of Destruction.
Select March 7th
Characters come in different Types and follow different Paths. Learn about each character in the detailed screen.

speaker: March 7th
line: This place is full of fancy little gadgets — Herta's collection. I really don't get why she'd go out of her way to collect them and then leave them here to gather dust...

speaker: March 7th
line: Enough dilly-dallying, we gotta go.

speaker: March 7th
line: Ah, it's the Antimatter Legion! So these crazy jerks made it all the way here... Watch this!

html_content:
(Enter battle against Voidranger: Reaver ×2, Baryon ×1)
(Interactive tutorial)
The Type icon indicates the enemy's Weakness Type.
The white bar below the Weakness Types indicates the enemy's Toughness
Using attacks of the same Type as the enemy's Weakness Types will reduce the enemy's Toughness.
Select the enemy on the right as your target
This attack can deplete the enemy Toughness to zero.
Use Basic ATK on the enemy
Use Ice attacks to inflict Weakness Break, causing enemies to Freeze.
Use Physical attacks to inflict Weakness Break, causing enemies to Bleed.

speaker: March 7th
line: You're stronger than you look... Seem to be quite the fighter.

text: Listen to March 7th and protect yourself

title: Step Description
content: You keep thinking about what March 7th said: "The Legion are rampaging through the space station like a pack of wolves..." It seems like the road ahead is going to be a hard one.You look at March 7th beside you and she nods at you with confidence.You then look at the baseball bat in your hand, which is glowing as if also full of confidence.You can do it too, give it a try!

speaker: March 7th
line: So we'll take that elevator on the central platform to go down to the master control zone. Do you know the way?

speaker: March 7th
line: Um, I notice that you're not wearing the space station staff uniform. Do you really work here?

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ...Really? Feels like you're tricking me...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ...Memory loss, huh. You must've been injured.

speaker: March 7th
line: ...Never mind. I won't ask if you don't wanna talk about it.

speaker: March 7th
line: Let's go, I'll take you to the safe zone~

text: Go to the elevator in the central area.

title: Step Description
content: It would seem that the only way to the space station's master control zone is through the elevator — it doesn't seem to be too far.

children.text: The enemy's Weakness Type can be viewed after approaching them
Entering battle with an attack that matches the enemy's Weakness Type can reduce the Toughness of the enemy in advance

html_content:
(Enter battle against Voidranger: Reaver ×1, Baryon ×2, Voidranger: Distorter ×1)
(Interactive tutorial)
(After Voidranger: Distorter uses Nihility's Command)
(Trailblazer) is locked on by the enemy, and will be attacked first
March 7th follows the path of Preservation and can protect allies
Select March 7th's Skill
Select (Trailblazer), who is currently being locked on
Use Skill to shield (Trailblazer)
Shield will be displayed on the outer edge of the HP bar
(After the shielded Trailblazer is attacked)
When a character takes DMG, the Shield effect will be reduced first

speaker: March 7th
line: Ah. I knew it...

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Nah, I think the elevator's broken. I pressed all the buttons but nothing happened.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: —But it wasn't me! The Antimatter Legion must've broken it!

speaker: March 7th
line: Too bad Dan Heng's not here. He's like a walking encyclopedia... He knows a ton of complicated stuff — maybe even elevator repair...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I don't know that one.

speaker: March 7th
line: Whoa! Why are you here!? ...And how did you get here before us?

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I took another route to the upper level, and I saw you guys from up there.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Arlan is in the control room. He's been injured, but not fatally.

speaker: March 7th
line: You found him! Will he know what to do about this elevator?

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I suppose as the head of the Security Department, he should know.

speaker: March 7th
line: Then let's go talk to him!

text: Go to the monitoring room and meet up with Arlan

title: Step Description
content: Just like in all those classic movie scenes — the elevator doesn't work.Despite March 7th calling him a "walking encyclopedia," even Dan Heng, who somehow made it in time, doesn't know what to do.However, Arlan, the head of the Security Department rescued by Dan Heng, probably knows the answer...As expected, Dan Heng saves the day once more.

text: Change your team lineup to meet different kinds of challenges

html_content:
(Interactive tutorial)
Open the Team Setup menu to adjust your team composition.
Add character
Select Dan Heng
Add Dan Heng to the team
Open the Character menu to increase characters' levels.
Select Dan Heng
Select Level Up
Select Character EXP Materials
Increase Character Level

text: A special ability that can help with exploration.

html_content:
(Interactive tutorial)
Technique is a special ability used for exploration
Use March 7th's Technique to gain an edge in combat.

(Enter battle against Voidranger: Distorter ×1, Voidranger: Reaver ×1, Antibaryon ×1)
(Interactive tutorial)
March 7th's Technique can randomly Freeze an enemy when the battle starts

speaker: Arlan
line: Hey... you're all together?

speaker: March 7th
line: Yep, we're from the Astral Express~

speaker: Arlan
line: Oh... Did Madam Herta send you to help?

speaker: Dan Heng
line: It's just a coincidence. We came to deliver the rare relic Herta trusted us to find... We didn't expect to arrive during an invasion.

speaker: March 7th
line: Why is the Antimatter Legion targeting you guys? It seems they just ignored the surface of the planet and came straight to the space station.

speaker: Arlan
line: I... have no idea. The Legion came at a very suspicious time — almost right after the security system suddenly failed.

speaker: Arlan
line: Lady... Lead Researcher Asta immediately began to organize the evacuation. I was supposed to cover everyone as they evacuated, but... I didn't expect to end up failing in this task.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Don't be too hard on yourself. Your leg and dominant hand were injured. It was a wise decision to hide here and avoid a head-on encounter with the Legion.

speaker: March 7th
line: Yeah! Most of the staff have been evacuated safely, so right now our highest priority is to return to the master control zone and plan a counterattack! So... do you know how to use the elevator? I couldn't start it...

speaker: Arlan
line: After the evacuation was complete, the elevators were all shut down to keep the Legion away from the master control zone.

speaker: Arlan
line: Since Lady Asta sent you to look for me, I assume she must've given you the encryption key for accessing the elevator system?

speaker: March 7th
line: Oh, right, she did give me some sort of card...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: ...March...

speaker: March 7th
line: But where did I put it...

speaker: Arlan
line: You...

speaker: March 7th
line: Ah! Here it is!

title: Step Description
content: You can sense from Arlan's cautious gaze that the encryption key is not only used for unlocking authorization but also proof of your identity.Hurry up and use it.

speaker: Arlan
line: ...Now that we found the key, we should get going. We can use that console over there to unlock the elevator.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Let's go.

speaker: Arlan
line: Hold on. I only activated the elevator on the highest floor. We'll have to go there to use it.

children.speaker: Arlan
children.line: Because I mustn't give the Legion any chance to reach the master control zone by the elevator. I must ensure the safety of the station's staff.

children.speaker: Arlan
children.line: So I'll have to trouble you to take a bit of a detour... Apologies.

children.speaker: Arlan
children.line: Sorry... This space station was entrusted to Lady Asta by Madam Herta. I must do this for the safety of the master control zone and the staff there.

children.speaker: Arlan
children.line: So I'll have to trouble you to take a bit of a detour... Sincerest apologies.

speaker: March 7th
line: Huh? You're not coming with us?

speaker: Arlan
line: My leg is injured... I'd only slow you down. I'll stay here and shut down the elevator once you've made it to the master control zone.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: You won't slow us down. And you should be able to shut down the elevators from the master control zone, right?

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ Agreed. (Trailblazer) and I made it here safely, and now we've also got Dan Heng. We're more than enough to protect you~

speaker: March 7th
line: Let us worry about the Antimatter Legion. You just follow us and keep yourself alive~

text: You can use me as a crutch.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Aren't you a nice kid!

speaker: Arlan
line: ...Thank you.

text: Go to the upper level and take the elevator to the master control zone

title: Step Description
content: Arlan seems to worry that he would be a hindrance, but you as a group already developed a sort of delicate rapport in how to persuade him. Could this be what it means to be companions?Hurry and reach the top floor with your companions.

text: Level up Traces to comprehensively enhance your character

html_content:
(Interactive tutorial)
Open the Character menu to view characters' Traces.
Enter the Traces screen
Choose Traces Node.
Activate Traces to strengthen the character.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: Do you know why the Antimatter Legion would invade the station, Arlan?

speaker: Arlan
line: They must've come for Madam Herta's collection... But as to why, I still...

speaker: Dan Heng
line: I heard there's something called a Stellaron in Madam Herta's collection.

speaker: Arlan
line: ...That's not the kind of information someone in my position would have access to.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: The repulsion bridge has been shut down?

speaker: Arlan
line: Yes. To stall the enemy, more or less.

text: (Interact with controller for the repulsion bridge)

speaker: March 7th
line: Hey, these shiny things... Are these Light Cones ? I thought only the Interastral Peace Corporation had rare stuff like this.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: No, Light Cones are Garden of Recollection technology. They allow you to carry memories around — very potent enhancement items. I heard the corporation paid a lot for the usage rights, but I've no idea how Herta managed to get hold of one.

speaker: Arlan
line: They were acquired legitimately, that's all I can say. Take them, they're very useful in combat.

text: New Feature Available: Characters — Light Cones
Provides stat boost [ sic ] to characters. Offers special abilities if the wearer's Path matches that of the Light Cone.

html_content:
(Obtain Collapsing Sky ×1)
(Interactive tutorial)
Open the Character menu to view Light Cones.
Select (Trailblazer)
Enter the Light Cone screen
Light Cones can offer stat bonuses to characters.
Equip Light Cones that match the character's Path to activate powerful Light Cone abilities.
Equip (Trailblazer) with a Light Cone.

speaker: March 7th
line: Is that it? We've reached the elevator already? That wasn't too many monsters~

speaker: March 7th
line: Oof, probably shouldn't have said that... Might bring bad luck.

speaker: Dan Heng
line: You've grown, March.

html_content:
(Interactive tutorial)
(After entering battle)
Activate 2× speed to experience faster combat.
(After the Voidranger: Trampler uses Spiral Arrow)
The enemy has locked onto (Trailblazer), ready to use a powerful Charge attack.
Use March 7th's Skill to give a Shield to the ally being locked on
Use Real-Time Combat View to check characters' current status
Real-Time Combat View displays the buffs and debuffs that are taking effect on your characters
Click to view detailed information about the enemies

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: Hey, sore losers

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: You can't just gang up on us!

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: Go!

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: Why does it always have to get this exciting?

children.speaker: Himeko
children.line: Anyway, at least you're back.

speaker: Himeko
line: March, Dan Heng, you've been through a lot.

speaker: March 7th
line: Whew, Himeko~ What took you so long! That last wave of Antimatter Legion came at us like a swarm of locusts, have you ever tried shooting locusts with a bow?

speaker: Himeko
line: I wouldn't have made a difference. My orbital cannon can deal with a whole bunch of enemies at once, but I couldn't just blow up the space station with it — Herta would NOT like that...

speaker: Himeko
line: Are you alright, Arlan? Asta's been worried about you.

speaker: Arlan
line: I'm fine, a quick patching up will do. Thanks for asking. I'll report the situation to Lead Researcher Asta immediately. Bye.

speaker: Himeko
line: Hey, nice to meet you. I'm Himeko, navigator of the Astral Express.

speaker: March 7th
line: In other words, she's in charge of where the Express goes.

speaker: Himeko
line: March hasn't been any trouble for you along the way, has she?

speaker: March 7th
line: ▶ (Trailblazer), think carefully about how you wanna reply to that.

text: I've never met a more reckless girl in my life.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ...That's just my charm! And I didn't cause any trouble. You just have to get used to me... Look, Dan Heng agrees, right?

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: I have the right to remain silent.

text: I've never met a more lively girl in my life.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ▶ Well, that's the joy of youth! We should take every step forward full of energy! ( He's / She's ) a discerning one, isn't ( he / she ) , Dan Heng?

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: I have the right to remain silent.

text: In that case, I'd rather not answer.

children.speaker: March 7th
children.line: ...Oh, looks like we have two Dan Hengs on our team now.

children.speaker: Dan Heng
children.line: Please leave me out of this.

speaker: Himeko
line: Haha, look at you all, you've already gotten really close.

speaker: Himeko
line: Come on, Asta has been worried about all of you.
